properties.title: Argo CHLA profile metrics (0–200 m, 10 m bins) with PACE matchups
properties.description: Per-profile CHLA metrics from global BGC-Argo floats (Mar 2024–Nov 2025), binned 0–200 m in 10 m bins, matched to PACE OCI L3 4 km Daily Rrs, chlor_a, and Kd_490 within ±24 hours and nearest grid cell.

links.title: CHLA(z) in situ profile datasets (Argo & OOI, optional PACE matchups)
